p: Although there are characterized by excellent reproducibility, but all of them were different in their response to antioxidants under certain conditions. The highest nitric oxide (40.36%), DPPH (31.22%), super oxide (23.66%), and ABTS (20.95%) anti-radical scavenging activities were found in the 150 mM slow release fertilizer treatment, which could be due to higher phenolic content, whereas the lowest various anti-radical scavenging activities were obtained in the 50 mM urea treatment.
